headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Veeva Systems (VEEV) Winning Bristol Myers Squibb as a Vault CRM Client
summary: Bristol Myers Squibb recently announced its adoption of Veeva Systems' Vault CRM, underscoring Veeva’s growing presence in life sciences cloud software among top biopharma companies worldwide. This trend highlights a significant shift towards industry standardization on Veeva's platform, reflecting deepening trust and integration within major pharmaceutical organizations. We’ll examine how Vault CRM’s adoption by global pharma leaders could shape Veeva’s investment narrative moving...
